reviewText: Because this is my favorite series on TV, I was thrilled to get this three season pack for a good price and shipped quickly.  Thank you.

We really like Blue Bloods, but are somewhat sad, because Tom Selleck probably won't make any more Jesse Stone Dvd's. We have all of those and were looking forward to several more, but now with Blue Bloods, Tom may feel he is too old to be Jesse again. Blue Bloods looks to us to be good for a few more seasons.

The set has been a great purchase. The family values in each episode are an added benefit to the insights of police life. The series writing portrays many levels of operations and critical thinking required of police officers. Valued experience in sharing with adult children and family viewing.

We don't watch many TV series, but based on recommendations, purchased all three seasons, never having seen any episodes.  WOW, we fell in love with the entire Reagan family.  There all human, and easily seen as real, not perfect, but great role models.  But one of the best atrtributes is that the language is acceptable.  We've only been to NYC a couple of times, and this series takes you everywhere.  The photography is excellent, and the street scenes make you feel you are not on a sound stage in the back lot of an old LA movie studio.  Sunday dinner's bring memories of home, and always brings the family back to earth and each other as the primary support [and accountability] group.  After a few of the 15-17 episodes from season one, we bought season 4 and can't wait to get season 5 currently airing.  We don't watch regular TV, so we'll have to wait until season 5 is released.  You won't be disappointed in this excellent all family program.
Do the math.  Buying the first three seasons individually is cheaper than buying this boxed set.

Cop dramas have come and gone over the years. Many have become the fodder of our jokes as in Gag Me and Mace Me. Many have stood the trite "Test of Time" as in Colombo. Miami Vice was cutting edge, flashy, always used hit music as opposed to studio bands preforming covers. Hill Street Blues was the first show that broke out from the Dragnet and Kojak pigeon hole depicting the humanistic side of those who protect and serve. Now after dozens of police procedurals on the small screen, along comes Blue Bloods with Mr Tom Selleck in the first chair. For me, an old guy who never was trendy or ratings conscious, this show out shines them all! I mean, CSI shows cant even decide which one will carry the torch. What is there, 6 variants with CSI in the title? Well, neither here nor there I suppose. I like Blue Bloods as I have not liked a show for decades. The family bond is like none other ever put out there, well maybe save be for Duck Dynasty. No, really . . . . the Reagan table is such a believable counter point to the rest of the police necessities. The violence and crime is always in the plot as one would expect, however it is not shoved in the viewer's face. It is dealt with in a  . . . . well in a civil manor, if you will. Again, I like it. The drama moves me. I am honored to have the first three years in my home. I will collect them all!
The best television series I have seen for many years.and this three-pack is extremely good value so make sure you go for it!

What is there to say ! I have, and ALWAYS will love, and respect Tom Selleck ! Magnum, P.I., Jesse Stone, Frank Regan, I don't care. Donnie, A.K.A. Danny Regan, has always been awesome ! Jamie Regan, The BEST man they could have ever got for his part, Way to smart for standard T.V. Sorry Will Estes, But, Mr Harvard always steals the show. Of course, SUPER sexy Bridget Moynahan is AWESOME too ! she is the Spice in the Family. Len, I could NEVER forget the family voice of reason ! Ok Jack, Sean, and Nikki, Love you too ! Of course, I love saving the BEST for last ! Linda Reagan, ( yes, I spelled Reagan wrong before) Shoot me, Amy Carlson was on Third Watch ! Loved her then, and still do. sorry danny. LoL. Nothing since third watch has proven to be more entertaining to watch. They only allow me to offer five stars ! would give this show a 10 !! Solid, and Flawless .
